message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $11,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,500 is significantly lower than what I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $11,000 for the product.
Bob, I'm sensing some hesitation on your end.  While I aim to be fair, I also know the true value of this product.  Let's make this work - $12,250, and we have a deal.
I'm not willing to go above $11,000, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $11,000?
